cap_size.Description: head circumference and EEG cap sized used

block_1.Description: pseudo permutation of sensory feedback conditions: condition of first block
block_1.Units: Visual = Visual only condition; Visual + Vibro = Simultaneous visual and vibrotactile sensory feedback

block_2.Description: pseudo permutation of sensory feedback conditions: condition of second block

block_3.Description: some select participants completed a third block with Visual + Vibro + EMS sensory feedback
block_3.Units: Visual + Vibro + EMS = Simultaneous visual, vibrotactile and electrical muscle stimulation sensory feedback
